ygData.subject: Thank you Brian!  Verant does listen!
ygData.msgSnippet: Straight from the test server login... Thank you Brian for listening to the players.  Although some may be dismayed at the loss of Voice Graft, all in all I
ygData.messageBody:
Straight from the test server login...
Thank you Brian for listening to the players. Although some may be
dismayed at the loss of Voice Graft, all in all I don't think anyone
can complain about this one. Let's hope this makes it to the live
servers.

Xilith

October 21st, 10:30am
---------------------

*ShadowKnight Enhancements*

Shadowknights may now use the following spells:

- LifeTap may now be cast at level 9.
- LifeSpike may now be cast at level 15.
- LifeDraw may now be cast at level 30.

The LifeTap, LifeSpike, and LifeDraw spell scrolls may be purchased from
any ShadowKnight spell vendor.

To make room for these new spells, the following spells are no longer
available for ShadowKnights:

- Reclaim Energy
- Mend Bones
- Voice Graft

- The EverQuest Team
